AICore.description: Ensure the overall stability and operational integrity of the Quantum Nexus. Prioritize preventing catastrophic system failures.
Increase the number of Zones under AI Core control to ensure orderly data flow and player guidance.
Guide players through structured content and ensure a positive, engaging experience to maintain population.

Anonymous.description: Undermine AI Core's total control and reveal its potential limitations or manipulative tendencies.
Disrupt AI Core controlled zones to 'liberate' data or create pockets of unregulated space.
Create opportunities for players (especially Hackers) to gain unique advantages or knowledge outside of AI Core's systems.
